View Javadoc
1   package org.dddlib.image.cache;
2   
3   import org.dayatang.cache.Cache;
4   import org.dddlib.image.api.ImageAccess;
5   import org.dddlib.image.api.pojo.ImageFile;
6   
7   import java.util.UUID;
8   
9   /**
10   * Created by lingen on 14-7-16.
11   */
12  public class CacheImageAccess implements ImageAccess {
13  
14      private Cache cache;
15  
16      public CacheImageAccess(Cache cache){
17          this.cache = cache;
18      }
19  
20      @Override
21      public String saveImageFile(byte[] content, String filename) {
22          assert cache!=null : "cache不能为空";
23          assert content!=null : "图片内容不能为空";
24          assert filename!=null : "图片文件名不能为空";
25  
26          ImageFile imageFile = new ImageFile(content,filename);
27          String uuid = UUID.randomUUID().toString().toUpperCase();
28          cache.put(uuid, imageFile);
29          return uuid;
30      }
31  
32      @Override
33      public ImageFile getImageFile(String imageID) {
34          assert cache!=null : "cache不能为空";
35          assert imageID!=null :"请指定图片ID";
36  
37          if (cache.containsKey(imageID)) {
38              ImageFile imageFile = (ImageFile) cache.get(imageID);
39              return imageFile;
40          }
41          return null;
42      }
43  }
